#summary User manual - Simple guide to set up LOCAL development environment for the project
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Implementation

= The softwares needed =

 * Download and install (if not already) [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7-downloads-1880260.html JDK1.7] 

 * Download and install [https://eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-ee-developers/lunar Eclipse Luna for JavaEE]

 * Download and install [http://tomcat.apache.org/download-80.cgi Apache Tomcat 8.0.15] (Core)
  
 * Install SVN plugin for eclipse ([https://eclipse.org/subversive/documentation/gettingStarted/aboutSubversive/install.php detailed instructions here])

 * Download and install [https://bitbucket.org/easyphp/easyphp-devserver/downloads/EasyPHP-DevServer-14.1VC11-install.exe EasyPHP] for local database administration 

----

= Check out the project =

Within Eclipse, check out our google code project 
{{{
svn checkout http://sopra-carpooling-insa-4ir-i-tdb-1.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ sopra-carpooling-insa-4ir-i-tdb-1-read-only
}}}

----

= Database initialisation =

You have to execute the SQL Script _svn/trunk/SopRide/db/setupDatabase.sql_ in order to initialise your database.

 # Launch EasyPHP and then go to [http://127.0.0.1/modules/ EasyPHP Administration Modules]
 # Click on PHPMyAdmin
 # Then, click on the "SQL" button visible at the top of the interface.
 # Paste the SQL queries from _svn/trunk/SopRide/db/setupDatabase.sql_ (you can access to a copy of the file on the dedicated wiki page) 


----

= Launch the web application =
 # Once you have launched Eclipse Luna and you have checked out our project, press CTRL + F11 to Run the Application
 # Go to [http://localhost:8080/SopRide/ the Sopride homepage] and start using the website.
